body: hi, all i try to run the "outdoors_airflow" case with butterfly and came across a problem shown below. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5rCHVdQFf2ntmo-*5P8Zz4s0SZsYMt8xVttjHmxVuoc4WJtdfgVmOcHDVAM0p4MBRJHQsreeG6lWr*0RcGzsSQPKs7sQ-F4Y/error.png)it seems that the software failed to write the getid.bat to get id from docker. however, i think i have installed the openFOAM correctly on Windows. i have successfully get a id from docker and run a OpenFOAM case manually. please see the attached screen shot [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/5rCHVdQFf2mlmq8-DwV2T1TUoboh039NRNTenXnPQfVX1JCly6epW454Ff*-PUP16frsuu1gHhZqHpJuusr75wP2KqxtKLcP/OF.png) is anyone can help me to solve the problem. thanks a lot.
